overview:
Mathias Ericsson is the CEO of CloudMe and has a solid background in Branding and Business strategy. He is focused on building CloudMe to a well-known brand and loved service.

For more than ten years, Mathias worked on branding and communication issues in a range of listed and unlisted companies, as a consultant, senior executive and board member. He also holds lectures in the potentials of the emerging social media landscape.

Mathias is an awarded business executive and company developer and has worked on a strategic level as an advisor to national and international clients, with a focus on realizing and streamlining business goals, connecting them with internal and external communication.
